name: Space Shepherd
description:
You're in the aftermath of a huge space battle. Many of your comrades are stranded in the remaining debris. Find as many of them as you can, and guide them to the Home Hub. Who knows, maybe there's a medal in it for you in the end, if you make it.

This is a submission to Godot Wild Jam #34. The theme of the jam was "space".

A short guide on how to play:

  • Use left, right and space to control the ship (or rebind controls as you please).
  • Look for your comrades (blue by default, color scheme can be changed). When you locate them, get close to them to activate their ship.
  • They will follow you, but may get off screen sometimes.
  • There's an indicator ring around your ship to help you. On it, there's an icon pointing to the direction of the home hub (your target). There are also dots pointing to the nearest of your comrades.
  • Space junk will hinder you and your flock, but otherwise is harmless (for now!).
